Pick the blue buttons..." "
See how far you can CHOOSE!" "
Green is a win, red is a lose.
Get ALL the green, and YOU will advance!" "

Hit the RESET button restart a game
from your current level." "
To completely start over, use 
Start Over from the menu,
or rotate your phone.

Enjoy!"
